segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen scene, and it's kind of heartwarming at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is there in her apron, polishing that plate so neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the water gushing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling up and spilling everywhere, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, just keeps drying away oblivious to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting slippery with that puddle spreading out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, behind her, the kids are up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky stool, stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? That thing looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, hand out, begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats while mom's not lookingâ€”naughty but cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, everything's calm, which makes this inside frenzy even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
